        Use either this method or withFilePath(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path), but not both.
        Parameters:
        dir - Path to column family directory. The directory is created if does not exist. The file is given a unique name within this directory.

      • build

        public StoreFileWriter build()
                      throws IOException
        Create a store file writer. Client is responsible for closing file when done. If metadata, add BEFORE closing using StoreFileWriter.appendMetadata(long, boolean).
        Throws:
        IOException
